panels.description: Current status of worker nodes based on node-resource-exporter. Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Worker Node Status

panels.description: Number of pods currently in Pending state without a node assigned. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Unscheduled Pods

panels.description: Scheduler throughput based on successful operations per second. Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec. Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (count metric as proxy). YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec. Higher is better.

targets.expr:
# Kueue: Admitted workloads/sec
(sum(rate(kueue_admitted_workloads_total{cluster_queue!=""}[5m])))
OR
# Volcano: Scheduled tasks/sec (proxy)
(sum(rate(volcano_task_scheduling_latency_milliseconds_count[5m])))
OR
# YuniKorn: Allocated containers/sec
(sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state="allocated"}[5m])))
OR
# Default to 0 if no scheduler metrics found
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Success Rate (ops/s)

panels.description: Rate of failed/rejected scheduling/admission attempts per second. Kueue: Inadmissible attempts. Volcano: Job retries (proxy). YuniKorn: Rejected/Error attempts.

targets.expr:
# Kueue: Inadmissible attempts/sec
(sum(rate(kueue_admission_attempts_total{result="inadmissible"}[5m])))
OR
# Volcano: Job retries/sec (proxy for issues)
(sum(rate(volcano_job_retry_counts[5m])))
OR
# YuniKorn: Rejected/Error attempts/sec
(sum(rate(yunikorn_scheduler_container_allocation_attempt_total{state=~"rejected|error"}[5m])))
OR
# Default to 0
vector(0)

panels.title: Scheduler Failure/Retry Rate (ops/s)
Average Job Times
panels.description: Average times for Jobs (K8s & Volcano) based on unified exporter metrics, filtered by job namespace. Wait Time: Created to Start. Execution Time: Start to Completion. Total Time: Created to Completion.

panels.title: Job Status Count
panels.description: Number of Jobs (K8s & Volcano) in different states based on unified exporter metrics (filtered by job namespace and kind). Uses numeric phase mapping.
Total number of Pods in each phase over time based on KSM metrics (filtered by namespace). Provides a view of system throughput and potential bottlenecks (e.g., high Pending count).
panels.title: Pod Phases Over Time (Stacked)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Wait Duration (Created to Start) based on unified exporter histogram.
panels.title: Job Wait Duration (Histogram)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Execution Duration (Start to Completion) based on unified exporter histogram. Includes Succeeded and Failed jobs.

targets.expr: sum(rate(unified_job_execution_duration_seconds_histogram_sum{job_kind=~"Job|VolcanoJob", status=~"Succeeded|Failed"}[5m])) by (job_kind, status) / sum(rate(unified_job_execution_duration_seconds_histogram_count{job_kind=~"Job|VolcanoJob", status=~"Succeeded|Failed"}[5m])) by (job_kind, status)

panels.title: Job Execution Duration (Histogram)

panels.description: Average and P95 Job Total Duration (Created to Completion) based on unified exporter histogram. Includes Succeeded and Failed jobs.

targets.expr: sum(rate(unified_job_total_duration_seconds_histogram_sum{job_kind=~"Job|VolcanoJob", status=~"Succeeded|Failed"}[5m])) by (job_kind, status) / sum(rate(unified_job_total_duration_seconds_histogram_count{job_kind=~"Job|VolcanoJob", status=~"Succeeded|Failed"}[5m])) by (job_kind, status)

panels.title: Job Total Duration (Histogram)
Job Concurrency by Phase (Unified)
panels.description: Number of jobs (K8s & Volcano) currently in each phase, stacked. Based on unified exporter metric 'unified_job_concurrency_count'.

panels.title: Job Concurrency by Queue (Unified)
panels.description: Number of jobs (K8s & Volcano) currently active per queue, stacked. Based on unified exporter metric 'unified_job_concurrency_count'.

panels.title: Cluster Resources: Overall Simulated Utilization (Node Exporter)

panels.description: Sum of simulated CPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable CPU across worker nodes (excludes control plane). Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated CPU Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of simulated Memory usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable Memory across worker nodes (excludes control plane). Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated Memory Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Sum of simulated GPU usage (pod requests) as a percentage of total allocatable GPUs across worker nodes (excludes control plane). Based on node-resource-exporter. Shows 0 if no GPUs requested/available.
panels.title: Cluster Simulated GPU Usage vs Allocatable

panels.description: Time series of simulated resource usage (pod requests) compared to total allocatable resources over time (excludes control plane). Shows dynamic changes in cluster resource allocation. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Simulated Usage Allocation Trends (%)

panels.description: Simulated resource usage (pod requests) over time in absolute values (excludes control plane). Shows actual CPU cores, memory bytes, and GPU counts requested across all pods. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Total Simulated Usage Over Time (Absolute)
Cluster Resources: Pod Distribution & Node Load (Node Exporter)

panels.description: Current number of pods per node compared to allocatable pod capacity and simulated CPU/Memory usage percentage. Uses metrics from node-resource-exporter. KWOK nodes are identified by label. Excludes control-plane.
panels.title: Pod Count & Usage per Node (Table)

panels.description: Number of Pods scheduled on each worker node over time (excludes control plane). Helps identify load balancing and saturation patterns. Based on node-resource-exporter.
panels.title: Pod Distribution per Node (Timeseries)

panels.description: Distribution of nodes based on their simulated CPU utilization percentage (pod requests / allocatable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Node CPU Utilization Distribution (%)

panels.description: Distribution of nodes based on their simulated Memory utilization percentage (pod requests / allocatable). Excludes control plane.
panels.title: Node Memory Utilization Distribution (%)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated CPU/Memory utilization percentage across nodes (excludes control plane). Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing.
panels.title: Node Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Average and Standard Deviation of simulated GPU utilization percentage across nodes (excludes control plane). Lower StdDev indicates more even load balancing. Shows 0 if no GPUs.
panels.title: Node GPU Utilization Evenness (Avg & Std Dev)

panels.description: Number of worker nodes (excludes control plane) with simulated utilization (pod requests / allocatable) exceeding 80% for CPU or Memory.
panels.title: Saturated Nodes Count (>80% Usage)
Cluster Resources: Simulated Usage Details Per Node (Node Exporter)
Node Simulated CPU Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated CPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Node Simulated Memory Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated Memory usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter.

panels.title: Node Simulated GPU Usage (Avg/Min/Max)
panels.description: Average, Minimum, and Maximum simulated GPU usage (pod requests) across selected nodes (use $node variable). Based on node-resource-exporter. Will show 0 if no GPUs requested or available.
Average actual CPU cores used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. Based on cAdvisor metrics.
panels.title: Scheduler CPU Usage

panels.description: Current Memory Working Set used by all scheduler components (Kueue/Volcano/YuniKorn). Lower is better. Based on cAdvisor metrics.
panels.title: Scheduler Memory Usage

panels.description: Actual CPU usage (cores) for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns. Based on cAdvisor.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod CPU Usage

panels.description: Actual Memory Working Set for each scheduler pod (Kueue, Volcano, YuniKorn). Assumes standard namespaces and pod name patterns. Based on cAdvisor.
panels.title: Scheduler Pod Memory Usage
$scheduler: Pending/Inadmissible Count
panels.description: Shows scheduler-specific pending/inadmissible counts (filtered by namespace). Kueue: Workloads by status. Volcano: Pending pods (via KSM + label filter), Unscheduled tasks. YuniKorn: Apps in 'new' state. Check Prometheus if 'No data'. NOTE: Kueue LocalQueue metrics require the 'LocalQueueMetrics' feature gate.

targets.expr: sum(kube_pod_status_phase{phase="Pending", namespace=~"$namespace"} * on(pod, namespace) group_left kube_pod_labels{label_scheduling_k8s_io_group_name="volcano.sh"}) or vector(0)

panels.title: $scheduler: Scheduling/Admission Latency (P95)
panels.description: P95 internal scheduling/admission latency reported by the specific scheduler (namespace filter applied). Kueue: Admission Wait Time (creation to admission). Volcano: E2E Scheduling Latency (ms -> s). YuniKorn: Main Scheduling Loop Latency (ms -> s). Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Attempts/Retries/Allocations (rate/s)
panels.description: Rate of relevant actions per second by the specific scheduler (namespace filter applied). Kueue: Admission attempts by result. Volcano: Scheduled task rate (proxy), Job retry rate. YuniKorn: Container allocation attempts by state. Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Queue Resource Usage (CPU)
panels.description: Scheduler-specific view of CPU allocation/usage per queue. Kueue: Usage from admitted active workloads. Volcano: Allocated milli CPU. YuniKorn: Allocated vcores. (Namespace filter applied). Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Queue Resource Usage (Memory)
panels.description: Scheduler-specific view of Memory allocation/usage per queue. Kueue: Usage from admitted active workloads. Volcano: Allocated memory bytes. YuniKorn: Allocated memory bytes. (Namespace filter applied). Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

panels.title: $scheduler: Preemption/Node Activity
panels.description: Scheduler-specific view of preemption or node-related scheduling activity. Volcano: Preemption attempts/victims. YuniKorn: Node sorting latency, try-node latency, try-preemption latency. (Namespace filter applied). Check Prometheus if 'No data'.

list.description: Select namespace(s) where benchmark jobs/pods run.
list.label: Namespace
list.name: namespace

list.description: Select the active scheduler to display its specific metrics.
list.label: Scheduler
list.name: scheduler

list.description: Select node(s) to filter node-specific views (excludes control-plane by default)
list.label: Node
list.name: node
